Let all the world bear witness: I am a woman, I myself am a woman! Who dares deny it?  Indeed, who dares challenge my womanhood?"

data.en: He rolled his tongue seven times in his mouth before expounding:  Furthermore, even if the cost proves substantial, complaint is unwarranted.  Who knows but that, once this house possesses a suitable courtyard, your life might not commence a new era? This dwelling shall then transform into a locus, a club, a rendezvous for the nation's intellectual elite, a place dedicated to the ever-improving, ever-civilizing work of society.  Your involvement in such endeavors will not only enhance your reputation, but also secure the future of your nephew, Phước. In my estimation, children of this age require the full benefit of modern, civilized education, instruction both of body and spirit.  Our ancestors considered only the intellect; this was a grievous error.

Hắn có thể tự hào là Bình dân Bây giờ mà nói đến quý phái, trưởng giả là cổ hủ, là không đúng mốt nữa Khắp thế giới, đâu người ta cũng chỉ coi trọng Bình dân thôi Để chỗ cho Bình dân Bình dân vạn tuế
data.en: What cause for complaint?  Whether one gathers fallen blossoms or assists in a tailor's shop, both contribute to societal progress.  That he, an orphan, might later achieve some renown renders it all the more estimable.  As for the sons of mandarins, the scions of wealth, their future glory is hardly surprising. He may proudly claim the title of commoner. To speak now of nobility and gentry is antiquated, unfashionable. Throughout the world, it is the commoner alone who commands respect.  Make way for the commoner! Long live the commoner!

And with Tuyết as your bride, what other pair could claim a more harmonious union?

data.vi: Có biết sao Victor Ban thù tôi không? Xưa kia, khi còn học trường thuốc, tôi có giúp nó mọi cách để mở hiệu thuốc Sau biết rõ nó làm thuốc lậu bằng đất thó thì tôi thôi, rồi do thế nó thù tôi Nhưng mà thù thế là ngu dại, tôi chả sợ
data.en: Do you know why Victor Ban harbors resentment toward me?  In the past, while we were both students of pharmacy, I aided him in every way to establish his apothecary.  Upon discovering his illicit practice of compounding medicines with inferior ingredients, I ceased my assistance, and thus he bears a grudge.  But such animosity is folly; I am unperturbed.

data.en: And yet, the matter is readily apparent.  While France governs us democratically, our own sovereign is a monarch.  The Siamese king, too, is a monarch. To greet a monarch with a democratic slogan is implicitly seditious. The Protectorate government here is exceedingly just and discerning. I venture to assert that were we to cry, "Long live democratic France!", those standing where we stand would inevitably be apprehended.

Down with Fascism!" and those who mimic the Westerners, greeting with a raised fist as if to strike.

Democracy, after all, is antithetical to monarchy.  Should anyone dare to cry out "Down with the fascists!", the danger would be magnified, for such a cry constitutes an affront to our Siamese neighbor's sovereign.

data.vi: Thư acủ quản, âu là ta làm thế này: Ðối với những kẻ nào đi đón hai nhà Vua mà đứng ngây mặt ra như tượng thì thôi, ta tha bắt cho, còn kẻ nào ra ý vui mừng mà hô khẩu hiệu, hoặc vạn tuế nước Pháp, hoặc vạn tuế nhà Vua, thì ta cứ việc bắt giam cả một lượt

data.en: Upon the broadsheets, headlines proclaimed in bold characters spanning seven columns:  "Vietnam in its springtime resurgence, A pivotal juncture in history: Vietnamese-Siamese amity, The Northern and Southern Royal Progressions" (the Northern Progression referring to our sovereign's journey from Central Vietnam, the Southern to the Siamese king).  Certain papers, with fervent zeal, declared: "Two monarchs within one nation."  Remarkably, every publication characterized the Siamese king's visit as a "turning point."  Pro-monarchy journals extolled: "A singular honor bestowed upon the Vietnamese populace: the Siamese monarch, on this auspicious occasion, graciously visits our shores."  "Henceforth, Siam and Vietnam shall embark together upon the path of progress."  Only one dissenting voice, in stark contrast, featured prominently on its front page these cryptic pronouncements: "Boast of virtue, conceal your flaws; lest you invite contempt."

data.en: Esteemed listeners, this evening I wish to humbly share my limited understanding of “autumnal love”—that is, the natural desires and yearnings of the elderly, which society often deems inappropriate.  Our society has long been burdened by narrow-minded prejudices, a consequence of science’s failure to illuminate this aspect of human experience. For instance, should a fifty-year-old gentleman acquire a young concubine, he is immediately ridiculed as a senile fool—a subject of derision. (Applause)  Were a woman similarly involved in romantic pursuits, the shame would be even greater.  Society readily unleashes cruel judgment and scorn.  But is such condemnation truly justified?  Does the approach of old age revoke one’s license to experience sexual fulfillment?  No. For this is a matter ordained by nature, not subject to the dictates of mortal will. (Applause)

data.vi: Trong một đời, người ta có hai thời kỳ khủng hoảng về tình dục, ấy là tuổi dậy thì và lúc sắp về già Tạo hoá đã an bài ra thế, chứ loài người ít ai cưỡng được cái tuổi dậy thì nó gây ra sự khủng hoảng tinh thần cho thiếu niên bao nhiêu thì cái mùa thu của ái tình cũng gây cho lũ “lão giả an chí” sự bối rối bấy nhiêu Các ông già thì cưới vợ lẽ,(vỗ tay) rồi bị thiên hạ chê cười Các bà già rồi thì cũng lặn lưng vào vòng hoa nguyệt(vỗ tay) Hôm nay, diễn giả không cốt phô bầy ra đây những cái xấu ấy, nhưng mà là cắt nghĩa tại sao có những cái xấu ấy
data.en: In a single lifetime, humanity experiences two periods of profound sexual crisis: adolescence and the approach of senescence.  Thus has Nature ordained it, a decree few can defy.  The turmoil of adolescence afflicts the adolescent mind as profoundly as the autumn of love unsettles those of advanced years, those who believe themselves settled and content.  Elderly gentlemen take secondary wives—a spectacle met with societal derision—while elderly ladies, likewise, seek renewed romantic entanglements.  However, my purpose today is not to expose these failings, but rather to elucidate their underlying causes.

data.en: Should the husband remain robust, the wife's lot is indeed bountiful. Alas, oftentimes, the husband's vigor wanes, burdened as he is by the myriad tasks required to ensure the family's comfort.  (Applause)  Frequently, the husband is deceased, leaving many widows to confront a profound crisis. (Applause)  When such women neither remarry nor contemplate a new path, they inevitably seek solace in a lover. (Applause)  While many such circumstances may appear ludicrous, they stem from a singular physiological cause. This crisis, alas, few escape, and mercifully, it is transient.  We must remember that it originates within the reproductive organs: ovarian anemia and uterine cessation induce a physiological upheaval, a period Vietnamese women term "the waning."  Subsequently, after a time, other organs supply the ovaries with essential fluids, the crisis abates, and the woman regains her former wholesome spirit.

(He strikes his chest) It is this that caused me to relinquish personal glory, contributing instead to the advancement of order and peace within our nation. In this grave hour, the essence of self-sacrifice for one's country lies not in self-interest—not in the mere pursuit of victory—but in preserving the goodwill of a neighboring nation." Therefore, our present engagement is not a contest for petty gains or losses. We merely serve the diplomatic endeavors of the French government.

data.en: The high official raised a hand to interrupt: "Forgive me. That is merely confirmed State intelligence; however, the Government has yet to draft the decree, thus no immediate action is required.  Kindly allow two days; await but two more days.  Furthermore, it is my duty to inform you both orally that the Government's benevolence extends beyond this.  The Huế Court and the Vọng Các Government further extend their gracious consideration to you both, offering two medals which, should you desire, may be immediately bestowed upon your family members.  These are a Dragon Star medal and a Siamese Order of Merit. Moreover, the Director of French Politics in the East has extended an invitation for you both to dine with him this evening, believing that intimate conversation with you would afford him great pleasure."

data.en: Madam Pho Doan was so moved that her face flushed crimson, as if in shame.

data.vi: Bà chỉ muốn nhẩy ngay lên hôn người tình nhân đáng yêu và bí mật ấy, nhưng vì đã được tiết hạnh khả phong rồi, nên không dám
data.en: She yearned to leap forth and kiss that beloved and clandestine lover, yet her virtuous reputation, so carefully cultivated, forbade it.

data.vi: Ý hẳn phải từ đây lập tức bắt đầu treo gương sáng cho các bạn gái soi chung
data.en: Henceforth, let a shining example be immediately set for all the young ladies to emulate.

data.vi: Tuyết đã bất đắc dĩ chạy vào ngồi sau một tấm bình phong để làm ra vẻ hổ thẹn về sự hôn nhân một cách thành thực
data.en: Snow, constrained by circumstance, retreated behind a screen, feigning bashful modesty at the prospect of a sincere marriage.

data.vi: Cụ phán bà ngồi dưới chân cụ ông, tuy vậy cũng cứ cắm mặt xuống, hối hận về cái tội tầy đình đã trót mắng mỏ con trai, chế trách con gái, và khinh bỉ ông Xuân bội tình
data.en: The elder addressed the woman seated at his feet; yet, she remained bowed in remorse, lamenting her grievous transgression of having unjustly rebuked her son, reproached her daughter, and scorned Mr. Xuân for his perceived infidelity.

data.vi: Còn cụ ông thì cụ đã nằm xuống kéo điếu thuốc phiện thứ chín mươi sáu, và nghĩ cách để bị đấm nữa thì mới thật là mãn nguyện
data.en: The old gentleman, already reclining amidst the smoke of his ninety-sixth opium pipe, contemplated the exquisite satisfaction of receiving another beating.

data.vi: Nhưng người ngồi đấy chưa ai kịp chúc mừng cậu nào thì đã lại thấy một chuỗi người nữa bước vào, ai cũng vui vẽ lắm
data.en: But before anyone present could offer their felicitations, another throng entered, each person radiating unbridled joy.

data.vi: Ðó là hai thầy cảnh sátMin Ðơ và Min Toa, ông Victor Ban, sư cụ Tăng Phú chùa Bà Banh, ông thầy số, cậu Tú Tân, ông phán mọc sừng, bà Typn
data.en: These were Inspector Minh Do and Inspector Minh Toa, Mr. Victor Ban, the Venerable Tang Phu of Ba Banh Pagoda, the numerologist, young Tu Tan, the cuckolded magistrate, and Madam Typn.

data.vi: Tôi xin thay mặt các ông chủ khách sạn đến chúc mừng
data.en: On behalf of the hotel proprietors, I offer our felicitations.

data.vi: Chúng tôi đại diện cảnh sát giới, đến có lời chia vui
data.en: We, representatives of the constabulary, have come to offer our felicitations.

data.vi: Bần tăng xin nhân danh đức Phật Tổ đến ban phúc thọ cho
data.en: I, a humble monk, invoke the blessings of the Buddha to bestow upon you longevity and good fortune.

data.vi: Chúng tôi mạn phép thay mặt các cho chị em phụ nữ
data.en: We humbly speak on behalf of the women.

data.vi: Tôi xin thay mặt các người chồng mọc sừng, chúc cho ông có được vợ trinh tiết
data.en: On behalf of all husbands thus afflicted, I offer my felicitations upon your acquisition of a virtuous wife.

data.vi: Sự chúc tụng tuy có vui tai thật, những quá đà thì cũng quá nhàm
data.en: While celebratory praise may indeed be pleasing to the ear, an excess thereof becomes tiresome.

data.vi: Nào cụ còn thiết gì đến chúc mừng với ca tụng nữá
data.en: What further need have you, sir, of felicitations and praise?

data.vi: Thế mà nào đã hết cho đâu Than ôi, đây kia lại một vị quý khách
data.en: And yet, the giving has not ceased. Alas, another esteemed guest arrives.

data.vi: Ông này bận quốc phục, ngực tinh những kim khánh và mề đay
data.en: The gentleman, attired in national robes, bore upon his chest the gleam of gold and jeweled ornaments.

data.vi: Nhưng mà sao, ông ta vừa bước vào là tự giới thiệu ngay: Kính chào các bà và các ông
data.en: Yet, upon his entrance, he forthwith presented himself:  "My profoundest salutations to the ladies and gentlemen assembled."

data.vi: Xuân Tóc Ðỏ nhăm mặt khó chịu, đứng lên
data.en: Crimson-haired Xuan, with a countenance of displeasure, arose.

data.vi: Ông kia chắp hai tay vái chào: Bẩm lạy quan lớn ạ
data.en: The gentleman clasped his hands in supplication, humbly addressing the high official:  "My lord, I beseech you."

data.vi: Thế ngài hỏi cái gì?
data.en: What, then, is your inquiry?

data.vi: Tôi chỉ là bình dân mà thôi
data.en: I am but a humble subject.

data.vi: Tuy bản hội cũng vẫn quý phái xưa nay thật, nhưng tôn chỉ, bẩm vẫn khuynh hướng về bình dân mà chứng cớ đích xác là bấy lâu nay vẫn có cả tổ tôm một cách bình dân y như bọn chủ sòng đấy ạ
data.en: Though our assembly maintains its ancient and noble lineage, its fundamental principle and inherent inclination lean towards the common people;  incontrovertible evidence of this is the long-standing practice of playing tổ tôm amongst us with the same unpretentious ease as amongst the gambling houses themselves.

data.vi: Ông kia lại dịu dàng: Bẩm cảm ơn quan lớn lắm ạ Xin quan lớn biết cho rằng tôi lại còn là một biên tập viên trong ban soạn tự vi nữa ạ Bản hội được thiên hạ đồn rằng quan lớn hay nói theo ngôn ngữ bình dân lắm, đại khái như mẹ khiếp, nước mẹ gì, vv Cho nên ngoài việc lại mời quan lớn vào hội, tôi phải xin phỏng vấn quan lớn để xin phép quan lớn ưng thuận cho những tiếng như thế được ghi vào bộ tự điển đương soạn nũua đấy ạ
data.en: Sir, with utmost deference, I express my profound gratitude.  May it please Your Honor to know that I also serve as an editor within the lexicographical committee.  It is widely rumored that Your Honor favors colloquialisms, such as, for instance, "Good heavens!" or "My word!", and so forth.  Therefore, in addition to the honor of inviting Your Honor to our society, I must humbly request an interview to secure Your Honor's gracious consent for the inclusion of such expressions in our forthcoming dictionary.

data.vi: Ông vừa ấp úng, vừa gãi đầu gãi tai: Bẫm cụ cố, chúng tôi xin thay mặt các nhà nho chủ trương thuyết l1y số chúc mừng cụ tăng phúc, tăng thọ, chúc cô dâu, chú rể giai lão bách niên Bẩm số mệnh thì tôi đoán thông thạo lắm Bẩm như số ông Xuân chúng tôi thì cách đây năm tháng, chúng tôi đoán trước, cũng rất đúng những sự như bây giờ Thật là con người tài cao, chí cả, dưới gầm giời danh tiếng xa
data.en: He stammered, scratching his head and ears:  "Esteemed ancestor, on behalf of the assembled scholars, we offer our felicitations upon your increased blessings and longevity, and extend our wishes for a century of wedded bliss to the bride and groom.  As for matters of destiny, I profess considerable expertise.  Indeed, in the case of Master Xuân, five months past, our predictions proved remarkably accurate, mirroring present circumstances.  Truly, a man of exceptional talent and noble aspirations, whose renown echoes beneath the heavens."

data.vi: Xuân Tóc Ðỏ đỡ hộ: Thưa ba, chính thế đấy ạ Ông thầy đoán trước đúng lắm
data.en: Red Hair respectfully submitted: "Father, it is precisely so.  The master's prediction was perfectly accurate."

data.vi: Cụ Hồng nhắm mắt lại, ho lụ sụ lên một cách cổ điển, ôm ngực mà khặc khừ: Biết rồi Biết rồi Khổ lắm Nói mãi
data.en: Elder Hồng closed his eyes, emitting a classic, racking cough, clutching his chest and wheezing:  "I know, I know.  It's unbearable.  I've said it enough."
